name: 🅦🅗🅔🅡🅔 🅘🅢 🅜🅞🅜?
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

🅣🅗🅔-🅖🅐🅜🅔:
A boy can't find his mom and decides to sail out in the
open world to find her. But some weird things happen on the
journey...

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

🅘🅝🅕🅞: The game is being made by [ONE DEVELOPER]:

Mike Andersen

Would be very thankful for some support at email:
wolfbuildxeu@gmail.com

I have released an alpha version "09-08-2017"

A great/good computer is recommended to run the game on ultra settings.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

🅝🅞🅣🅔: None notes right now.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

🅛🅞🅖:

An alpha version is now released! 
Date: 09-08-2017

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

🅓🅘🅢🅒🅛🅐🅘🅜🅔🅡: THE GAME STILL NEED A LOT OF IMPROVEMENTS "SOUNDS, GRAPHICS, GAMEPLAY, AI, CODING AND SO ON". BUT AT THE MOMENT I DON'T HAVE THE ABILITIES OR TIME TO DO ANY OF THESE 
THINGS.  SORRY... I WILL TRY TO THESE THINGS IF I GET ENOUGH
SUPPORT. BUT SADLY IS THIS PROBABLY NOT GOING TO HAPPEN... SO
JUST HAVE FUN PLAYING IF THAT IS EVEN A POSSIBILITY. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

🅗🅞🅦-🅣🅞-🅓🅞🅦🅝🅛🅞🅐🅓-🅐🅝🅓-🅞🅟🅔🅝-🅣🅗🅔-🅖🅐🅜🅔:

1. Must have Winrar
2. Download
3. Open the winrar folder and click on "READ ME IMPORTANT!" 
4. When done reading, go back and open the game menu by clicking on
"WhereIsMom-Alpha"
5. Choose your: Screen resolution, Graphics quality and Select monitor
6. Press "Play" and try to enjoy the game
